subject: Medicine
title: Placebo-Informed Care
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Placebo-Informed Care.

hook.text: Good doctors already use placebo principles without knowing.

buildup.text: Explaining treatments clearly boosts their effectiveness.

discovery.text: Confident delivery and positive framing enhance drug effects.

twist.text: Simply watching your IV drip work increases pain relief.

climax.text: Hiding treatment from patients reduces how well it works.

punchline.text: Seeing the medicine makes it stronger.

quiz.question: What happens when patients cannot see their treatment being given?
